Who do you think is worse, people who express genuine dissatisfaction with something or the people demanding them to remain silent.  I know we don't all live in the United States of America where people are guaranteed a right to free speech, but that doesn't matter.  This is cyberspace.  People are freed by anonymity to state anything they choose.  For others to try and admonish and parent others is ludicrous (and not in the Mike Tyson sense, I mean truly ridiculous).  Just allow others to express themselves and if you don't agree, then feel free to state your case and leave it at that.  I know, I know, look who's sounding like a parent now.  I'm just offering some advice that may calm you down.  Count to 10 or 100 if you have to people! :-)
